### Default Waiting in Three Sizes

```jsx
<p>Small</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-sm' />
<p>Default and Medium</p>
<Waiting />
<p>Large</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-lg' />
```

### Default Waiting in Theme Colors

```jsx
<p>Primary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-primary' />
<p>Secondary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-secondary' />
<p>Success</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-success' />
<p>Waiting</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-warning' />
<p>Danger</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-danger' />
<p>Light</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-light' />
<p>Dark</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-dark' />
```

### Linear Waiting in Three Sizes

``` jsx
<p>Small</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-sm' />
<p>Default and Medium</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear'/>
<p>Large</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-lg' />
```

### Linear Waiting in Theme Colors

```jsx
<p>Primary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-primary' />
<p>Secondary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-secondary' />
<p>Success</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-success' />
<p>Warning</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-warning' />
<p>Danger</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-danger' />
<p>Light</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-light' />
<p>Dark</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-dark' />
```

### SASS variables

```scss { "sassVariablesFile": "../scss/_variables.scss"}
```
### All Examples

```jsx noeditor
<div class="vvt-waiting">
<p>Small</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-sm' />
<p>Default and Medium</p>
<Waiting />
<p>Large</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-lg' />
<br />
<p>Primary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-primary' />
<p>Secondary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-secondary' />
<p>Success</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-success' />
<p>Waiting</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-warning' />
<p>Danger</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-danger' />
<p>Light</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-light' />
<p>Dark</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-circular waiting-dark' />
<br />
<p>Small</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-sm' />
<p>Default and Medium</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear'/>
<p>Large</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-lg' />
<br />
<p>Primary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-primary' />
<p>Secondary</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-secondary' />
<p>Success</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-success' />
<p>Warning</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-warning' />
<p>Danger</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-danger' />
<p>Light</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-light' />
<p>Dark</p>
<Waiting className='waiting waiting-linear waiting-dark' />
</div>
```
